title: DynastyCrypto
author: DynastyCrypto
content: Hi, I have a limited company based in the Isle of Man for trading cryptocurrency and am, fully legally, allowed to sell bitcoin with no KYC. I trade on Localbitcoins where there is an escrow service (link Below). The current rate is 5%. I am in the process of registering a corporate account with Binance to offer the same service, fully legally and fully compliant with no KYC. https://localbitcoins.com/ad/1479337/purchase-bitcoin-bank-transfer-united-kingdom-united-kingdomMy contact details are available on the link provided.
